attributes.review: i was excited to download this app but after taking 34 years to download i was already heated. i was willing to give it a second chance but then the app gave my phone a virus that took over my phone. some big orange cheeto came out my screen and ate my face off. i was faceless for a week so then i got surgery but it was so bad i killed myself. sorrry but this app hot garbage and deserves to be removed. this app is dangerous🌝
attributes.title: ✨juicy✨fat✨cooch✨

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded, it made my phone super slow and gave me aids so now I have to sit here with aids without my phone so now what? You have ruined my life and All I’ve ever wanted to do was become a pro Irish jigger.
attributes.title: Hey

attributes.review: Opened this app thinking I would be part of a great campaign but was immediately greeted by some sort of shriveled orange raisin??? Turned around to barf but then the app froze and my dog threw up on my shoulder. Now we both have ptsd, and i’m suing for damages 😤😤
attributes.title: whump

attributes.review: I can’t believe you can call this an app. The minute I opened it I wanted to be blind. Thank goodness I can leave a bad review because I can warn the next person who tries to get this app smh 🥰✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: This is the most God awful App

attributes.review: As soon as I dowloaded this app my phone shut down entirely and only showed an orange screen for hours while shrieking violently. 0/10 would not recommend, I think it was possessed with the spirit of Mr. Donald himself.
attributes.title: This app broke my phone

attributes.review:
I have successfully opened the app once when I first got it. And now, it crashes every single time. Not worth it. Just watch the news for campaign stuff

(And reserve your empty seats!)
attributes.title: Crashes. NOT WORTH IT!!!

attributes.review: When I downloaded this, first thing I saw was a picture of Big Bird, which is not the problem. BUT THEN I SAW ANIME!!!!! I am horrified!!!😫😣😔🙁😢☹️😢😣☹️😢😔Anime IS the gateway to evil!!! I saw it on Facebook!! Can't believe this app is trying to make us evil!!!! 😔😖☹️😭💔😫😖😢💔. honestly deserves 0 STARS!!!😔😖😣💔😣😭😢😔☹️😣
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISPICABLE💔😢😭🙁😖😣😔☹️😫

attributes.review: Honestly it took forever to download :( plus when I opened the app it immediately crashed on me just like how the economy did when Donald trump refused to admit that the Coronavirus was a risk to America and take preventive action.
attributes.title: Awful❤️

attributes.review: I want to just say this app is very glitchy it never opens fast enough and when it does I never see any of the content. I am very disappointed in this app.
attributes.title: Glitchy

attributes.review: when i first opened the app my eyes saw something so horrible i can’t even begin to explain. I am so disgusted!! 0/10 do not recommend downloading this app. if i could rate it zero stars i would!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE
